title: Resealable sleeves / bags for PSA graded postcards?
author: Will Allison

posts.post_title: Resealable sleeves / bags for PSA graded postcards?
posts.post_content: I'm looking for resealable sleeves/bags for PSA graded postcards. Does anyone here know of someone who is producing them? Thanks, Will
Just received some, they are nice.  They don’t seem to have any for SGC Postcard size slabs. Anyone know where to find SGC postcard sleeves?

[quote name="docpatlv" post=2266547]Just received some, they are nice.  They don’t seem to have any for SGC Postcard size slabs. Anyone know where to find SGC postcard sleeves?[/QUOTE]



I wish, but unfortunately they don’t exist to my knowledge. I just use the psa ones for my large Sgc slabs.
They do however have very nice standard size sgc perfect fit sleeves.
